backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three features, related files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing one-line summaries for major frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS config defining color tokens, themes, and base styles for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root mount element and script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all routes wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/branding/Portfol: Component showing the /gallery URL with copy-to-clipboard button and external link.
frontend/src/components/branding/QRCodeB: Renders a QR code inside a styled card using a boolean matrix.
frontend/src/components/branding/Section: Simple reusable header component displaying a title and optional subtitle.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with branding, quick links, contact details, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with logo, navigation links, social icons, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper providing header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaLight: Displays a modal lightbox for an image or video with close controls and item metadata.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaStrip: Shows up to four media items for a category or a placeholder if none exist.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Renders a service card with title, description, features, and related media strip.
frontend/src/content/branding.ts: Exports centralized branding assets including logo info and company names.
frontend/src/content/galleryMedia.ts: Defines the GalleryItem type and a list of categorized image media entries.
frontend/src/content/qrMatrix.ts: Provides a hardcoded QR code matrix for a contact URL.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Contains service definitions with descriptions and features plus additional offerings.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Exports site copy including company tagline, vision, mission, and contact info.
frontend/src/content/socialLinks.ts: Provides social media profile URLs for the company.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and context provision.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions including color variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company introduction, services list, and descriptive text inside styled components.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details including email, location, and phone numbers using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Provides a filterable media gallery with tabs, lightbox support, and empty-state handling for each category.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero section, navigation buttons, contact summary, QR code block, and service previews.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows all services using ServiceSection components and includes an additional offerings grid.
frontend/src/pages/VisionMissionPage.tsx: Presents the companyâ€™s vision and mission in two styled cards with icons.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the current state of the SAQ portfolio website project, including architecture decisions, branding requirements, known build issues, and pending rebuild request. Lists extensive image-cleaning tasks required for the gallery.
